definitions.text: the act of moving back and forth
abnormally rapid beating of the auricles of the heart (especially in a regular rhythm); can result in heart block

examples: they were amazed by the furious disturbance they had caused

definitions.text: the motion made by flapping up and down
move along rapidly and lightly; skim or dart
examples: The hummingbird flitted among the branches

definitions.text: move back and forth very rapidly
flap the wings rapidly or fly with flapping movements
